Author: kalanchoe-
Text: Yeah I’m sure there are legitimate reasons as well I didn’t consider certain medicines and their side effects. I’m sure the likes of Dulcolax are making a lot of money off people suffering from EDs, that was more my point. Also a warning against taking them as they are vile!

Author: LolitaJane
Text: I think that the 60-packs are also aimed at opiate users and other people who are on one of the many medications that tend to constipate
